Desc.entry: 42 beds for elderly medical patients aged 60 years and over with nursing care. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 8am-4.30pm, Fri 8am-1.30pm, emergency calls only on Friday afternoon and weekends

category.entry: CARE HOMES WITH NURSING FOR OLDER PEOPLE (NURSING HOMES)
